additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Bear & Bristle Detail Trimmer include : 1x AA Alkaline battery ; 1x Trimmer ; Contour Trimmer Head ; Detail Groomer; Blade Guard & Cleaning Brush.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: * Do not immerse trimmer in water. * Do not use trimmer to cut anything other than body hair. * Keep cutting blades clean with the brush provided. * Take care to avoid contact between the moving blades of the unit and the skin, paying particular attention to the face, neck and hands. * This appliance is not intended for use by persons (including children) with reduced physical, sensory or mental capabilities, or lack of experience and knowledge.
